about_the_game:
Welcome to Kawaii Pancakes: Maid Café, the most delightful and strategic battle of pancakes in the charming world of a maid café! Indulge in a fun and quirky twist on classic token-dropping games as you compete to stack pancakes, outwit your opponent, and become the ultimate pancake master.

Gameplay Overview:

Kawaii Pancakes: Maid Café, you and your opponent take turns dropping delicious, fluffy pancakes onto a beautifully designed board. The goal? Line up four or more pancakes in a row — horizontally, vertically, or diagonally — to score points and secure sweet victory! But there's more than meets the eye in this café showdown.

Flip the Script:

Not only can you drop pancakes, but you can also flip the board! Players have the option to flip an entire row or column, turning the game on its head by reversing the order of pancakes. Use this mechanic wisely to sabotage your opponent’s plans or set up your own spectacular combos.

Key Features:

  • Adorable Anime Art Style: Dive into the kawaii world of maid cafés with a fun, pancake-themed aesthetic, full of bright pastel colors and charming anime-style characters.

  • Strategic Pancake Dropping: Plan your moves carefully to line up your pancakes and score big points, while keeping an eye on your opponent’s strategy.

  • Flip Mechanic: Take the competition to the next level by flipping rows or columns, adding a layer of depth and unpredictability to every match.

  • Local & Online Multiplayer: Challenge friends in local or online multiplayer modes, or face off against AI to sharpen your skills.

  • Sweet and Cozy Atmosphere: Set in a warm and inviting maid café, the game offers a lighthearted and fun experience perfect for players of all ages.

Whether you're a seasoned strategist or just love a good pancake (who doesn't?), Kawaii Pancakes: Maid Café is the perfect game to satisfy your competitive cravings. Flip, stack, and line up those pancakes in this exciting blend of strategy and cuteness!

Join the café today and show your pancake prowess!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Kawaii Pancakes: Maid Café

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the world of Kawaii Pancakes: Maid Café, a charming anime-inspired strategy game where you drop pancakes onto a board and flip rows to score points. Line up four or more pancakes in a row and outsmart your opponent in this fun, fast-paced showdown set in an adorable maid café!
